body:
### Changes

- FIX: Remove readiness probe + remove resource limits (#357)
- Fetch user activity from GitHub using httpx & asyncio (#355)

### Changes

- Group GitHub API Navigation code (#354)

### Changes

- Bump cryptography from 2.7 to 3.2 (#340)

### Changes

- Merge dictionaries using new operator in Python 3.9 (#336)
- HOTFIX: Handle no open conference CFPs found edge case (#338)
- Use Flask's built-in shell (#339)

### Changes

- Update to Python 3.9 (#335)

- Improve settings workflow (#329)

### Changes

- Final touches of Call For Proposals feature (#328)

- Remove Tweepy (#326)
- Post Upcoming CFPs (#327)

### Changes

- Add secure.py (#321)
- Flash app messages to user; users can only upload pictures (#322)
- Remove Retweeter feature (#323)

### Changes

- Improve Upcoming Events Feature workflow (#316)
- Administrators can upload logos to display branded messages (#318)

Upcoming Events is now multi-tenant.

- Allow users to specify workspace logo (#304)

- Display number of posts specified in config (#306)

- Wire up Upcoming Events functionality for multiple workspaces (#292)

- Start getting Upcoming Events feature ready for multitenancy (#291)

- Feature flag for GitHub Summary feature (#288)

- HOTFIX: Helm chart name too long (#287)

Enable scheduling of tasks at a future `datetime`.

- Organize documentation (#276)
- Set up Redis task queue (#284)

Allow users to update configuration via web interface.

- First iteration of settings page (#280)
- Incorporate Bootstrap (#281)

Allow users to sign-in using Slack. Land on blank settings page.

- Consolidate app_home_opened_count in slack_user column (#277)

Fix deploy. No issues with code, just deploy.

- hotfix: fail if not success; fix env
- hotfix: remove debug code

### Changes

- hotfix: debug deploy

Figuring out deploy pipeline using GitHub actions.

- deliverybot -- create deploy.yml

- Remove Travis CI (#271)

Migrating to GitHub actions

- Create simple-example.yml

### Changes

- Update redis from 3.1.0 to 3.4.1 (#259)
- Blueprint for public facing website; add Whitenoise (#262)

No real feature work, adding structure and cleaning up tech debt for future development.

### Changes

- Change FK relationship for GitHub Summary User model (#254)

- Move models into app folders and delete unused Task models (#256)

We are now live on Kubernetes! Removed most of the code we don't need!

- Remove Ansible (#249)

- Cleanup scripts (#251)
- Improve Deployment Documentation (#252)

Starting to get ready for the Kubernetes migration.

We have started to migrate over to the latest Slack app toolkit. Taking advantage of the latest and greatest features!

Changes in this release are improvements related to the internal structure of Busy Beaver.
